post_body: N/A

Hi everyone, I’m literally begging for help.  
I’m a streamer and, in a way, my livelihood depends on this. I’m really nervous because I’ve been unable to figure out the issue for months.

To clarify a few things upfront:

 I’m not one of those players who screams, cries while gaming, or complains about being bad at the game. I’ve played CS 1.6 for a long time, CS:GO since 2019, and CS2 since its release. I play for several hours daily and can’t shake the feeling that something isn’t right. What’s going on?

Every time, I lose duels and it’s absolutely abnormal. Every time there’s a new update, the game seems to run worse for me. I feel like the game is choking in some way. When I engage in duels, my mouse feels off, like it doesn’t glide smoothly in those moments. It’s way too hard to land a kill, and I constantly feel like I’m playing at 60Hz. There’s this persistent feeling that everyone else is faster than me,they’re running, shooting, and aiming with insane precision. I hope you understand what I’m trying to describe. I literally have nothing on my PC, just CS2 and a couple of picture folders.

I’ll attach my CS2 settings, PC specs, and NVIDIA settings.

If anyone knows anything or can help me out, I’d be really grateful.

P.S. I’ve had numerous optimizations done by different people—some helped temporarily (but then things reverted), and some didn’t help at all.

Thanks! 

Pc spec : 

Mother board : rog crosshair x670e

Processor : amd ryzen 9 7950x

Gpu : nvidia geforce rtx 4070ti gigabyte

Ram : kingston fury 2x16 6000mghz ddr5

power supply : corsair rm 1000x

water cooling : nzxt
N/A
N/A

Im gonna buy a new pc, ive kind of narrowed down to probably buying a r7 7700 and RTX 4060, would this be good for CS2, what FPS could I expect with this? Does it make sense to upgrade to r7 9700x and 4070 instead or is it overkill? Or perhaps there are other alternatives in the price range of the specs I mentioned? Thanks a lot for any replies :)

post_title: KRIMZ: "Very unclear whats gonna happen in the near future"
post_body: N/A

Is South Africa region servers broken or having issues?   
  
I cant seem to find games bee searching for over an hour or so and no games.

I tried a VPN to EU and I got a game instantly in 20 seconds+- but cant play with the 180-200ms. 

[This is an example ive been searching for 40 min and shows 7 compatible? - what does it mean even?](https://preview.redd.it/6yyhffnt994e1.png?width=318&format=png&auto=webp&s=4b58666e4d2706545871b9c4c9781d075e184407)

So I had to reinstall Windows and had to create a new bootable usb with Windows media creation tool.

Sadly MS offers only W11 latest version which is 24H2.After install I have fps drops from 290 to 150-160, MAX ms goes from 4 to 40-50-80 for a moment and games stutters.Turned off razer synapse, spotify and any program that was working in background. It worked fine for a moment, but soon after that started stutter again.

Had no problem with 23H2 version, but had to reinstall for other reasons.I used to have like around 300-330 fps even with high settings.

My PC is with i5 13400f and rtx4060.

I wanted to go with 23H2 again, but I don't see any option to download that version of W11 from Microsoft and I don't trust other susp sites that offers iso of it.

Does anyone know how to fix that or atleast if theres a way to download a 23H2 from microsoft?

post_title: After Day 2, how’s everyone’s pick’ems doing?
post_body: Both Mongolz and Liquid were 3-0 for me so I’ve got 2 points end of day 2!

So basically, I have really good internet, like we are talking in the range of **850-1000 mbps**. All games have good ping, not higher than 10ms, EXCEPT CS2 !? I've attempted all the fixes like lowering my max acceptable matchmaking ping and everything that remotely entails ping on CS2 AND cmd panel. My friend runs on 11ms and lives in the same city as me and he never seemed to have any of these issues since he started playing. Can anyone help me in solving this issue?

Edit: I have a wired connection.

Thanks.

post_title: Mirage instant smoke window spawn line ups have changed slightly
post_body:
When did this happen? 

At least 2 of the lines up I've been using for 6 or so months have changed slightly. 

Has anyone else noticed this or am I taking crazy pills? What would cause something like this to happen?

I re-learnt them from the Instant Window workshop map after they removed jump throw binds. Which was updated accordingly.

I have attached pictures of the new lines up compared to where they previously were:

The circle is the original line up (that is now missing window) and my crosshair is the new one I've worked out that lands.
